snippet.title: Deflect Boy - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Deflect Boy is a top-down arena shooter, that instead of guns, you only have a shield. Deflect the bullets, acquire, and combine new skills to create unique deflection powers and survive until the nightmare ends.

Store page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2811910/Deflect_Boy/
